AncientParts2.description:
Core from technology that was lost long ago.
Nearly impossible to find on the Palpagos Islands, it contains a wealth of forgotten knowledge.

AncientTechnologyBook_G1.description:
A book that contains long-lost secrets of technology from a forgotten era.
Use it to obtain Ancient Technology Points.

Arrow.description: An Arrow for use with a bow.

Arrow_Fire.description:
An Arrow for use with a Fire Bow.
Deals Fire damage.

Arrow_Poison.description:
Arrows to use with a Poison Bow.
They will poison any target hit.

AssaultRifleBullet.description: Ammo for Assault Rifle and other similar weapons.

AssaultRifle_Default1.description:
An Assault Rifle suited to long range combat.
It excels at rapid-fire and is well suited to taking down powerful foes.

AssaultRifle_Default2.description:
An Assault Rifle suited to long range combat.

AutoMealPouch_Tier1.description:
Unlocks a food slot in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

AutoMealPouch_Tier2.description:
A decently sized pouch for holding food.
Unlocks 2 food slots in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

AutoMealPouch_Tier3.description:
A large pouch for holding food.
Unlocks 3 food slots in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

AutoMealPouch_Tier4.description:
An extremely large pouch for holding food.
Unlocks 4 food slots in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

AutoMealPouch_Tier5.description:
An extraordinarily large sack for storing food.
Unlocks 5 food slots in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

Axe_Tier_00.description:
An axe for cutting wood.
Made from stone, it's not very sharp.

Axe_Tier_01.description:
An axe for cutting wood.
Made from metal, its sharpness has improved.

Axe_Tier_02.description:
An axe for cutting wood.
Made from high quality metal, its sharpness has improved even further.

BLT.description: A dish where bacon, Lettuce, Tomato are sandwiched in Bread. Consumption increases Attack by +15% for a while.

BaconEggs.description:
The smoky essence of bacon intertwines flawlessly
with the gentle texture of eggs, creating a sublime harmony of flavors.
Eat to increase Attack by +10% for a period of time.

BakedMeat_BerryGoat.description:
Mild roast filled with the natural aromas of
herbs and berries embedded in the meat.
Gives a pleasant sense of warmth when eaten outdoors.

BakedMeat_Boar.description:
Boar grilled over a hearty flame.
Crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside.
Perfect as an extravagant main dish for a big party.

BakedMeat_ChickenPal.description:
Chicken skewer slow-grilled over a charcoal fire.
Light and refreshing on the tongue.

BakedMeat_CowPal.description:
Thick, well-done steak.
Strong flavors give those who eat it an energy boost.

BakedMeat_Deer.description:
Carefully roasted venison with delicate flavor notes,
accented by the aromas of the deep forest.
Elegant taste for an elegant lifestyle.

BakedMeat_Eagle.description: Grilled meat full of vitality for flying high in the skies.

BakedMeat_GrassMammoth.description:
Boasts a rich and dignified flavor.
Memories of glaciers and deep forests come rushing back with every bite.

BakedMeat_IceDeer.description:
When taken from a flame, Reindrix meat rapidly drops in temperature.
This allows it to retain freshness for long periods of time,
making it a perfect emergency ration.

BakedMeat_Kelpie.description:
Fresh fish grilled over a charcoal fire.
Plump and juicy.

BakedMeat_LazyCatfish.description:
Grilled fish slathered with a secret sauce.
Soothes both mind and body.
Perfect for tired Pal Tamers.

BakedMeat_SakuraSaurus.description:
Grilled meat brimming with the flavor of the king of the wilds.
Juices from the compressed meat flow from the bone,
making it surprisingly tender despite the initial toughness.

BakedMeat_SheepBall.description:
Spiced and roasted mutton.
Deeply complex with unique flavors.

BakedMushroom.description:
Cooking this mushroom enhances its nutritional value.
Curiously, it's also quite filling.

Baked_Berries.description:
Cooking enhances their nutritional value,
and surprisingly, they are quite filling.

Bat.description:
A Wooden Club for close range combat.
Fighting a Pal with it might be tough.

Bat2.description:
Baseball bat for close-range combat.
Might be tough to get a home run with a Pal.

Berries.description:
A versatile ingredient that is delicious raw or cooked.
They can be found anywhere on the island.

BerrySeeds.description:
Seeds that produce Red Berries.
Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be obtained when picking Red Berries.

Bone.description:
Bone collected from Pals.
Used in the creation of high quality Paldium.

BowGun.description:
This can be used to fire Arrows effortlessly.
Its power more than makes up for its slow reload time.

BowGun_Fire.description:
A Crossbow that deals Fire damage.
It is loaded with Fire Arrows.

BowGun_Poison.description:
A Crossbow that inflicts poison on its target.
It is loaded with Poison Arrows.

Bow_Fifth.description:
An enhanced bow that allows five arrows to be fired simultaneously.
By some strange mechanism, it only consumes a single Arrow when fired.

Bow_Fire.description:
A bow that deals Fire damage.
Used with Fire Arrow.

Bow_Poison.description:
A bow that poisons its target.
Used with Poison Arrow.

Cake.description:
A dish that is eaten during celebrations.
Put it in the chest at your breeding farm to have a Pal lay a particularly healthy egg.

CarbonFiber.description:
A lightweight yet sturdy material.
Used to create armor among other equipment.

Carbonara.description:
A dish mixing pasta with Egg and Milk.
Eating it makes it improves Defense by +20% for a period of time.

CaveMushroom.description:
Mushroom that grows prolifically in caves.
Can be made into healing medicine.

Cement.description:
Cement used for creating structures and more.
Can be produced in a High Quality Workbench.

Charcoal.description:
Charcoal made from burning Wood.
It can be combined with Sulfur to create Gunpowder.

CheeseBurger.description: A meal made with a Hamburger with cheese squeezed between it. Upon consumption, it increases the satiety level for a certain period as well as Defense +10%.

Cheeseburger_2.description:
Now with cheese, this dish has reached the highest level of fine cuisine.
Eat to increase Attack by +20%
and stay full longer for a period of time.

ChickenSaute.description:
Plump poultry sautéed in butter.
Accented with fresh lemons.
Eat to slightly increase work speed for a period of time.

Chowder.description:
Dumud lavishly covered in a thick, creamy soup.
Eat to increase work speed
and stay full slightly longer for a period of time.

Cloth.description:
Cloth woven from Wool.
Required to create armor.

Cloth2.description:
High Quality Cloth woven from a large amount of Wool.
Required to create high quality armor.

ClothArmor.description:
Clothes made from Cloth.
Protects against the cold of night.

ClothArmorCold.description:
A Cloth Outfit produced in cold regions.
Can withstand freezing cold temperatures.

ClothArmorHeat.description:
A Cloth Outfit produced in hot regions.
Can withstand some heat.

Coal.description:
Coal often found in caves and other places.
Required to create high quality metal.

CopperArmor.description:
Armor made of metal.
Its sheer weight speaks to its sturdiness.

CopperArmorCold.description:
Improved Metal Armor.
Useful for activities in cold regions.

CopperArmorHeat.description:
Improved Metal Armor.
Proudly boasts a high heat resistance.

CopperHelmet.description:
A helm made of metal.
A reliable piece of armor that protects your head, and all the thoughts within.

CopperIngot.description:
A material required to create metal weapons and armor.
Refined from Ore using a furnace.

CopperOre.description:
Becomes an ingot when refined using a furnace.
Can be found in caves and other places.
There are rumors of Pals capable of detecting ore.

CrudeOil.description:
A material that can be processed into various products.
Obtained by installing a Crude Oil Extractor in an oil field.

DecalGun_1.description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Cattiva where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

DecalGun_2.description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Lamball where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

DecalGun_3.description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Melpaca where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

DecalGun_4.description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Anubis where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

DecalGun_5.description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Relaxaurus where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

DeerLocoMoco.description:
Thick hamburger steak accented with a creamy fried egg.
This sublime combination brings pure joy to the mouths of those who eat it.
Eat to increase Attack by +20% for a period of time.

DeerStew.description:
A tender, melt-in-your-mouth venison stew crafted with love.
The intertwining flavors of vegetables and meat create a harmonious blend that brings out a comforting richness.
Eat to increase Defense by +20% for a period of time.

Diamond.description:
A rare gemstone that glows brilliantly.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

DogCoin.description:
A mysterious coin. Apparently there are people who collect these.
A Mimog will usually have them, but
for some reason, they cannot be obtained by butchering it.

DoubleBarrelShotgun.description:
A shotgun ideal for close range combat.
Despite the limited load capacity, it still packs a punch.

Eaglestew.description:
Slow-cooked dish that exudes a burst of rich, wild flavors.
Eat to make SAN decrease slightly slower for a period of time.

Eemerald.description:
A gemstone that glows green.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

Egg.description:
Delicious when fried, but can also be used to cook various meals.
Chikipi produce them.

ElecBaton.description:
A baton with electricity running through it.
It can shock a Pal, stopping it in its tracks.
Electrocuted Pals are easier to capture.

ElectricOrgan.description:
Material obtainable from <uiCommon id=|COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Electricity|/> Pals.
It stores electricity, but requires caution when used.

Elixir_attack_02.description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises Attack when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

Elixir_hp_02.description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises Health when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

Elixir_stamina_02.description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises Stamina when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

Elixir_weight_02.description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises carrying capacity when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

Elixir_workspeed_02.description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises Work Speed when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

ExpBoost_01.description:
Training manual that grants a tiny amount
of EXP when read by a Pal.

ExpBoost_02.description:
Training manual that grants a small amount
of EXP when read by a Pal.

ExpBoost_03.description:
Training manual that grants a large amount
of EXP when read by a Pal.

ExpBoost_04.description:
Training manual that grants a substantial amount
of EXP when read by a Pal.

ExplosiveBullet.description: Ammo for Rocket Launcher and other similar weapons.

Fiber.description:
Fiber collected from trees.
A material used when creating bows, etc.

FireOrgan.description:
Material obtainable from Fire Pals.
Can be used to make Fire Arrow and more.

FlameThrower_2.description:
Flamethrower that fires long-range flame.
Can set the enemy on fire.

FlameThrower_3.description:
Flamethrower that fires long-range flame.
Can set the enemy on fire.

FlameThrower_4.description:
Flamethrower that fires long-range flame.
Can set the enemy on fire.

FlameThrower_5.description:
Flamethrower that fires long-range flame.
Can set the enemy on fire.

FlamethrowerBullet.description:
Flamethrower fuel.
Ammo for the Flamethrower and similar weapons.

Flint.description:
A material required to start a fire.
Can sometimes be found when excavating rocks.

Flour.description:
Flour made from grinding Wheat.
It can be used as an ingredient in making Bread.

FragGrenade.description:
A Frag Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing damage to enemies.

FragGrenade_Elec.description:
A Shock Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, electrocuting everything in the blast radius.

FragGrenade_Fire.description:
A Incendiary Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, setting the surrounding area on fire.

FragGrenade_Ice.description:
A Ice Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, freezing the surrounding area.

FriedChicken.description:
Magnificently juicy poultry.
Eat to increase work speed
and make SAN decrease slower for a period of time.

FriedEggs.description:
An Egg now fried and even more delicious.

Spear_ForestBoss.description:
The spear cherished by Lily.
Punishes those who neglect their Pals.

Spear_QueenBee.description:
Spear made from Elizabee's staff, altered for human use.
It is imbued with Elizabee's indomitable spirit.

Spear_SoldierBee.description:
A spear made from the Beegarde's spear, altered for human use.
Can feel a sincere loyalty.

SphereLauncher.description:
A new type of launcher that fires a large number of spheres.
It can easily capture a herd of Pals.

SphereLauncher_Once.description:
A launcher that fires spheres.
It can capture Pals that are a distance away.

StatusPointResetSan.description:
A potion that allows the player to reset their status points when consumed.
It has no effect if consumed by a Pal.

StealArmor.description:
Armor made from Pal Metal Ingot.
High defense, but extremely heavy.
Equipment for a hero, it exudes bravery.

StealIngot.description:
Material required to create weapons and armor using Pal Metal.
Made stronger by creating an alloy from metal and Paldium.

StewedIceDeer.description:
Stewed vegetables and venison that was reared in a frigid environment.
The meat's soft texture melts away to reveal a delicate sweetness.
Eat to stay full slightly longer for a period of time.

Stone.description:
Material for structures and items.
Can be obtained by mining rocks.

Sulfur.description:
Sulfur that can be found in volcanoes and such.
Necessary for making Gunpowder.

Sweet.description:
Cotton candy collected from Woolipop.
Its sweetness fluffily melts away in your mouth.

Sword.description:
Sword for close-range combat.
The blade is extremely sharp!

TechnologyBook_G1.description:
A book that contains secrets of amazing technology.
Use it to obtain a few Technology Points.

TechnologyBook_G2.description:
A book that contains secrets of cutting-edge technology.
Use it to obtain Technology Points.

TechnologyBook_G3.description:
A book that contains secrets of technology beyond current day comprehension.
Use it to obtain lots of Technology Points.

Tomato.description:
A fresh ingredient that brightens any dish.
Filled with lycopene, they’re also very healthy.

TomatoSeeds.description:
Seeds that produce Tomato.
Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.

Torch.description:
Hold a Hand-Held Torch in hand to brighten the area around you.
Can also be used for close range combat in a pinch.

TreasureBoxKey01.description: A key that can be used to open locked treasure chests.

TreasureBoxKey02.description: A key that can be used to open locked treasure chests.

TreasureBoxKey03.description: A key that can be used to open locked treasure chests.

Unko_L.description:
It has an intimidating presence.
Whether it's the scent or the shape, this is the mark of a heavyweight.

Unko_S.description:
Animal dung.
An essential part of any ecosystem, and can even be used as fertilizer.
It smells awful, to say the least.

UnlockEquipmentSlot_Accessory_01.description:
A mysterious box whose insides synchronize with the owner's body.
Accessory equipment slots increase by 1.

UnlockEquipmentSlot_Accessory_02.description:
A mysterious box whose insides synchronize with the owner's body.
Accessory equipment slots increase further by 1.

Unlock_Picking_Tier1.description: No key? No problem! These tools will allow you to try and pry open any treasure chest that would normally require a Copper Key.

Unlock_Picking_Tier2.description: No key? No problem! These tools will allow you to try and pry open any treasure chest that would normally require a Silver Key.

Unlock_Picking_Tier3.description: No key? No problem! These tools will allow you to try and pry open any treasure chest that would normally require a Gold Key.

Venom.description:
Material obtainable from poisonous Pals.
Can be used to make Poison Arrow and more.

Wheat.description:
An ingredient that forms the base of various dishes.
Wheat is a common crop in many parts of the world.

WheatSeeds.description:

Necessary for starting a farm.

Wool.description:
